name: Bubble Legend Mania
description:
Let’s blast all the bubbles!
Bubble Legend Mania is the most popular and classic bubble shooting game. Experience the astonishing journey across over 200 compelling levels. Download Bubble Legend Mania and spread the fun!

○● Match 3 or more bubbles of the same to burst
○● Tap anywhere you want the bubble to shoot on the screen
○● RESCUE all the chickens to level up
○● Use powerful props smartly to deal with tough levels
○● Reach level targets within required moves
○● Various powerful props - Color Bubble, Aiming Line, Fire Bubble, etc.
○● Bubble shooting game for ALL ages
○● Super small game size(Less than 10MB)

Play amazing Bubble Legend Mania in Google Play for free NOW!!
